name: Tiramisu Cookies
description: Tiramisu in cookie form, because why not?! Coffe Caramel Sandwiched between Vanilla Rum flavored Cookies. Vegan Gluten free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2 Tablespoon brown rice flour (or use whole wheat pastry flour/all purpose)
1 Tablespoon rum (or use 1/2 tsp rum extract)
3 Tablespoons raw sugar or equivalent sweetener (a Tbsp more if you like the cookies sweeter)
1.5-2 Tablespoons Coconut creamer or thick non dairy Cream (I used So Delicious hazelnut coconut)
2 teaspoons rum/amaretto or 1/2 teaspoon rum extract

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl mix all the wet ingredients for the cookie and flaxmeal until sugar is well combined and keep for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl mix all the wet ingredients for the cookie and flaxmeal until sugar is well combined and keep for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix/whisk the dry ingredients well. Add in the dry ingredients and mix to get a soft dough. Add more oats flour if needed. Chill the dough covered for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix/whisk the dry ingredients well. Add in the dry ingredients and mix to get a soft dough. Add more oats flour if needed. Chill the dough covered for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: (A good rum extract has worked best for me for these cookies and the filling. I use this extract)
recipeInstructions.name: (A good rum extract has worked best for me for these cookies and the filling. I use this extract)

recipeInstructions.text: Oil hands and make balls. Flatten them on parchment. bake at pre-heated 350 degrees F for 12-14 minutes(depends on size of the cookie). Will make 12 small cookies.
recipeInstructions.name: Oil hands and make balls. Flatten them on parchment. bake at pre-heated 350 degrees F for 12-14 minutes(depends on size of the cookie). Will make 12 small cookies.

recipeInstructions.text: Dont let the cookies overbake to a brown. The cookies are done when the tops are not jiggly.
recipeInstructions.name: Dont let the cookies overbake to a brown. The cookies are done when the tops are not jiggly.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, mix the water and sugar and keep cooking on medium till the sugar syrup gets thick and turns a good shade of brown.(5-7 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, mix the water and sugar and keep cooking on medium till the sugar syrup gets thick and turns a good shade of brown.(5-7 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Keep the other ingredients mixed and warm. Taste and add more coffee if needed. Add the warm mix slowly to the caramel to get a creamy mixture. Take off heat as soon as the mixture is well combined and starts to boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Keep the other ingredients mixed and warm. Taste and add more coffee if needed. Add the warm mix slowly to the caramel to get a creamy mixture. Take off heat as soon as the mixture is well combined and starts to boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Apply the cream between 2 cookies and let cool before biting in. Sprinkle some cocoa powder on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Apply the cream between 2 cookies and let cool before biting in. Sprinkle some cocoa powder on top.

recipeInstructions.text: You can also add a few chocolate chips to the caramel when still hot. Too much chocolate though will mask the coffee flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: You can also add a few chocolate chips to the caramel when still hot. Too much chocolate though will mask the coffee flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: For a creamier softer filling, add a little vegan cream cheese to the caramel and whip it, then spoon in between the cookies. Fill cookies only before serving is using cream cheese.
recipeInstructions.name: For a creamier softer filling, add a little vegan cream cheese to the caramel and whip it, then spoon in between the cookies. Fill cookies only before serving is using cream cheese.

recipeInstructions.text: If the filling doesnt have cream cheese, then the cookies can be stored in an airtight container at room temperature for 2-3 days.
recipeInstructions.name: If the filling doesnt have cream cheese, then the cookies can be stored in an airtight container at room temperature for 2-3 days.

keywords: gluten free cookies, vegan cookies, whoopie pies
